statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE program_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT program_id, description FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE program_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, description FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE program_name LIKE '%Gold%' OR description LIKE '%Exclusive%';
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM loyalty_programs WHERE end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, program_id, join_date FROM customer_participation ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT program_id, COUNT(customer_id) as total_customers FROM customer_participation GROUP BY program_id;
SELECT program_id, program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_participation WHERE join_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_id, COUNT(*) as total_participants FROM customer_participation GROUP BY program_id;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, program_name FROM customer_participation JOIN loyalty_programs ON customer_participation.program_id = loyalty_programs.program_id WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Customer;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM LoyaltyProgram WHERE discount_rate > 0.05;
SELECT customer_id, name, email, loyalty_points FROM Customer WHERE loyalty_points >= 100;
SELECT * FROM Participation ORDER BY total_spent DESC, participation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Customer ORDER BY name DESC, customer_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, email FROM Customer WHERE loyalty_points > 100 ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT c.name, p.program_name FROM Customer c JOIN Participation pa ON c.customer_id = pa.customer_id JOIN LoyaltyProgram p ON pa.program_id = p.program_id WHERE pa.total_spent > 500 ORDER BY c.name ASC, p.program_name DESC;

SELECT c.name AS customer_name, lp.discount_rate AS program_discount FROM Customer c JOIN Participation pa ON c.customer_id = pa.customer_id JOIN LoyaltyProgram lp ON pa.program_id = lp.program_id WHERE lp.discount_rate >= 0.05 ORDER BY lp.discount_rate DESC;

SELECT c.name, lp.program_name, pa.participation_date FROM Customer c JOIN Participation pa ON c.customer_id = pa.customer_id JOIN LoyaltyProgram lp ON pa.program_id = lp.program_id WHERE pa.total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY pa.participation_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 50;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_amount FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id;
SELECT reward_type, reward_value FROM rewards WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT program_name, description FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY program_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, reward_type, reward_value FROM rewards WHERE reward_value > 50 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, program_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, reward_id, claim_date FROM customer_rewards WHERE status = 'claimed';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM loyalty_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 1000;

SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, rewards.reward_name FROM customers JOIN customer_rewards ON customers.customer_id = customer_rewards.customer_id JOIN rewards ON customer_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY amount DESC;
